quotes.quote: The past is the past, you cant change it. All you can do is look forward to the future.
It is not the past that matters but the future.
The present defines the future. The future builds on the foundation of the past.
Your past success is a foundation into future success.
It is possible to reclaim your future, to build a happy life despite an imperfect past. We can order the universe to our will and mind.
Your past is just a story. And once you realize this it has no power over you.
I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
In this bright future you can't forget your past.
Forget the past - the future will give you plenty to worry about.
Study the past, if you would divine the future.
Whatever your past has been, you have a spotless future.
We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
There are certain moments when we might wish the future were built by men of the past.
You can never plan the future by the past.
No amount of sophistication is going to allay the fact that all your knowledge is about the past and all your decisions are about the future.
Trying to tear down the past prohibits you from building up your future.
I am not interested in the past, except as the road to the future.
To design the future effectively, you must first let go of your past.
The best way to predict the future is to study the past, or prognosticate.
Fear not for the future, weep not for the past.
You can't let your past hold your future hostage.
The past resembles the future more than one drop of water resembles another.
Laugh about the past and dream about the future.
We are all here for some special reason. Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.
Your past is important but it is not nearly as important to your present as the way you see your future.
In this bright future you can't forget your past.
Regardless of your past, your tomorrow is a clean slate. You can choose what you want to write on that slate.
You cannot change the past, but your future is spotless. You can write on it what you will.
Don't worry about people from your past there's a reason why they didn't make it to your future.
